headline: Marsh to transform freight broker auto liability market with launch of proprietary US insurance facility and first-of-its-kind analytics solution
summary: NEW YORK, August 13, 2025--Marsh, the world’s leading insurance broker and risk advisor and a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE:MMC), today announced the launch of BrokerSafe, an exclusive insurance facility for US freight brokers seeking access to more stable and affordable freight broker auto liability coverage.
